content: Orange has launched an unprovoked invasion of Purple. This aggression threatens regional stability. I urgently need your diplomatic and material support to defend Purple.
Orange's invasion of Purple is unjustified. Please provide immediate military and economic assistance so we can repel this assault.
Orange has invaded Purple without cause. I ask you to condemn this aggression and implement sanctions on Orange.
Orange has attacked Purple unprovoked. This threatens regional stability. I appeal to our trade relations to dissuade further Orange aggression.
I propose coordinating our military response to Orange's invasion. A joint force would send a strong message.
Let's reinforce our military cooperation to counter Orange's aggression. I suggest joint military exercises along the Orange border.
Let's keep communication open on how to counter Orange without needless escalation. Your counsel is valued.
Purple thanks you for the intelligence sharing and military support. Let's continue working closely to contain Orange's aggression.
I hope we can work together to de-escalate tensions while firmly signaling to Orange that unprovoked invasions will not stand.
Let's keep communication open on responding firmly yet proportionately to Orange. Your counsel is valued.
Purple thanks you for the support. Let's continue working closely to contain Orange's aggression through deterrence and diplomacy.
